metadata.title: CVE-2015-0216 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: access.php in the Lesson module in Moodle 2.8.x before 2.8.2 does not setthe RISK_XSS bit for graders, which allows remote authenticated users toconduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via crafted essay feedback.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
